English: Summoned items applies to Portals, Pirate Ships, and Traveling Carts.
Affects how often Strange Portals and Pirate Ships appear.
Every fourth Strange Portal is normally 50% stronger than normal.#This option allows you to makes all portals merely strange.
Travelling Cart is only spawned on odd moons, usually 10% of#the time, starting with the ninth moon.
An animal pen allows you to stack animals. This does not. It just stops them from moving around.
A courtesy notification reminds you where cards will#spawn when you start or continue a game. Turn this#off to disable that notification.
